page.title: 10THE CHURCH, CASTLE CARROCK
page.content:
There were 4 main events in the 1985 Church social calendar; the first on 22nd February when a "Tatie Pot" supper, followed by slides, was held in the Watson Institute. In June a "Songs of Praise" evening was held when Parishioners, led by the WI choir, joined in singing their favourite hymns.
On 15th June 6 teams competed in the annual Inter-Village Knock Out Competition. The games vary from year to year - this year it was rounders. Any profits from the associated stalls and teas go to help the running of the Parish Church.
In early October there was the Harvest Supper following the Thanksgiving Service in the Church.
